meanings.sent1: She displayed nimious attention to every brushstroke in her painting.
meanings.sent2: The nimious gardener meticulously pruned each flower in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The nimious chef carefully arranged each ingredient like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His nimious approach to problem-solving ensured no detail was overlooked.
meanings.sent5: The nimious architect designed the building with precision and care.
